body:
Comment 7: 
In general I am very wary of rejecting currently valid programs. If the code never
executes, you've taken a working program and made it a non-compiling program.

The fact that gccgo rejects the program already pushes me a little in that direction,
but I'm still wary.

I feel like this has come up before but I cannot find the discussion. At the least we
should leave a <!-- --> comment in the spec this time.

I suggest putting this off until 1.4.
